title: China gears up for a big week as markets await U.S. elections and stimulus details
content: The size of China's highly anticipated stimulus plans will likely depend on the outcome of the U.S. presidential election, analysts say.
summary: The size of China's highly anticipated stimulus plans will likely depend on the outcome of the U.S. presidential election, analysts say.

title: Move over Black Friday: Consumer interest in 'Travel Tuesday' soars
content: Search interest for "Travel Tuesday" rose more than 500% over the last two years, according to a report published Thursday by McKinsey & Company.

title: Foreign buyers eye Japan's empty houses with millions available for cheap — but experts warn of risks
content: While many places in the world face a housing shortage, Japan is facing the opposite problem: An oversupply of homes on the market.

title: UK's Conservatives name Kemi Badenoch as new leader, shifting the party further to the right

title: Affirm expands buy now, pay later service to the UK, heating up local competition

title: Record numbers of wealthy Americans are making plans to leave the U.S. after the election

title: Shock poll shows Harris leading Trump in Iowa
content: Neither Kamala Harris nor Donald Trump has campaigned in Iowa since the presidential primaries. It is not considered a swing state in the election.
